column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Spot D. - Thank you for your review. We regret that you did not fully enjoy our fare. In the interest of improving our station
column2: can you tell me which ramen you tried? We work hard to provide a quality product
column3: and the bulk of our reviews praise us for such. But it is the lower ratings that help us improve
column4: so we're always happy to receive constructive feedback whenever possible.
